mapper.select:
select pda.id, pda.name, road.name as road_name, inspector.name as inspector_name, pda.`status`, pda.create_time, road.id as road_id, inspector.id as inspector_id from pda, road, inspector
inspector.pda_id = pda.id and inspector.road_id = road.id
and pda.name like concat('%', #{pdaName}, '%')
and inspector.name like concat('%', #{inspectorName}, '%')
and road.name like concat('%', #{roadName}, '%')
